name: RetrieveLegalHolds
description:
Retrieve all legal holds for an organization's case.

This tool retrieves the list of all legal holds within a specified case for an organization. It is intended for Enterprise plan users with the Enterprise Guard add-on, requiring Company Admin and eDiscovery Admin roles.

parameters.name: maximum_items_in_result
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of items to return in the result list.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items in the result list.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve the list of legal holds for a specific case. Required for identifying the organization.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds within a case.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds. Ensure it is a valid string identifying the case.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: An indicator of the result page position. Leave empty for the first page, or use the previous request's cursor value for subsequent pages.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.
